Event.Message: Cannot load storage device in '%1' because the version is incompatible with the version expected by the server. Server version %3 Client version %4 (Virtual machine ID %2). To fix this problem, you must upgrade the integration services.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="AdapterName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="AdapterId" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ServerVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="ClientVersion" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

Event.Message: Storage device '%1' received a recovery status notification. Current device state = %2, Last status = %3, New status = %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="DeviceState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="LastStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Storage device '%1' changed recovery state. Previous state = %2, New state = %3.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="CurrentState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Storage device '%1' received an IO failure with error = %2. Current device state = %3, New state = %4, Current status = %5.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="NewState" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="CurrentStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to map guest I/O buffer for read access with status %2. Device name = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: Failed to map guest I/O buffer for write access with status %2. Device name = %1
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: An I/O request for device '%1' took %5 milliseconds to complete. Operation code = %2, Data transfer length = %3, Status = %4.
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Command" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="DataTransferLength" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> <data name="Duration" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="DeviceName" inType="win:UnicodeString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Command" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="DataTransferSize" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="QueueTimeUSec" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ServiceTimeUSec" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="ChannelUniqueId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> <data name="LunSrbQueueTag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: QoS limit reached while initiating a SCSI operation.

Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>

<template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Source" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Message" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> </template>
